Film Perempuan Tanah Jahanam: Raih 1,5 Juta Penonton
04 Nov 2019, 14:23 by Sugandi Afandi


Film Perempuan Tanah Jahanam: Raih 1,5 Juta Penonton

KBRN, Jakarta: Film bergenre thriller Perempuan Tanah Jahanam (PTJ), sukses di pasaran. Di hari ke 18, film besutan Sutradara Joko Anwar, tembus 1,5 juta penonton. "Terima kasih teman-teman yang udah jadi bagian dari 1,5 juta penonton Perempuan Tanah Jahanam," tulis Joko Anwar di akun media sosialnya seperti yang dikutip oleh Radio Republik Indonesia, Senin (4/11/2019).Ada rasa bangga dan terkejut yang dirasakan oleh Sutradara kenamaan itu. Bangga karena karyanya diterima oleh masyarakat. Terkejut karena banyak anggapan film bergenre thriller, bakal sepi penonton. Namun, melalui film PTJ, Joko telah membuktikan nya."Awalnya mau coba-coba bikin film thriller. Katanya di Indonesia nggak ada filmnya. Ada ternyata teman-teman. Kami sangat bangga karena atas dukungan kalian semua, kita bisa bilang bahwa genre apapun punya kesempatan untuk sukses di Indonesia," ujarnya.Joko Anwar yang juga sebelumnya sukses dengan Film Pengabdi Setan, berharap sineas di Tanah Air dapat terus berkarya  menghadirkan film yang berkualitas dengan berbagai genre."Semoga ke depan, lebih banyak film Indonesia dengan tema, cerita, gaya yang lebih beragam. Amin".Joko menyampaikan apresiasi dan terima kasih kepada masyarakat dan pencinta film sehingga film PJT sukses di pasaran. Tidak menutup kemungkinan, jumlah penonton akan terus bertambah karena Film PJT masih diputar di bioskop-bioskop."Kalian, love you!!! Terima kasih sekali lagi teman-teman," ucapnya.Film PTJ, dibintangi oleh pemain film papan atas Indonesia. Sebut saja, aktris senior Christine Hakim. Ada pula nama Tara Basro yang karirnya terus menanjak, Ario Bayu, Marissa Anita dan Asmara Abagail. Film ini mengambil sejumlah daerah sebagai lokasi syuting yakni di Banyuwangi, Lumajang, dan Gunung Ijen.Joko Anwar merupakan  sutradara, penulis skenario, dan produser film yang bertangan dingin karena film nya selalu sukses di pasaran. Contoh, film Pengabdi Setan, mengokohkan sebagai film terlaris sepanjang tahun 2017 dengan 4,2 juta penonton. Karya Joko yang lainnya adalah Film Gundala (2019), A copy of Mind (2015) yang sukses diganjar Piala Citra dan sejumlah penghargaan lainnya baik dari dalam maupun luar negeri . Kemudian film Pintu Terlarang (2009), Janji Joni  (2005) dan Modus Anomali (2012).Dalam waktu dekat, film Joko lainnya yakni Ratu Ilmu Hitam akan tayang di bioskop seluruh Indonesia. (Sgd).

Film Wanita Tanah Jahanam: won 1.5 million viewers
Nov 04 2019, 14:23 by Sugandi Afandi


Film Wanita Tanah Jahanam: won 1.5 million viewers

KBRN, Jakarta: The thriller genre film Wanita Tanah Jahanam (PTJ), was successful in the market. On the 18th day, the film made by Director Joko Anwar, reached 1.5 million viewers. "Thank you friends who have become part of the 1.5 million viewers of Tanah Jahanam Women," wrote Joko Anwar on his social media account as quoted by Radio Republik Indonesia, Monday (11/04/2019). There is a sense of pride and surprise. felt by the famous Director. Proud because his work was accepted by the community. Surprised because many thought the thriller genre movie, would be quiet the audience. However, through the PTJ film, Joko has proven it. "Initially I wanted to try making a thriller. He said in Indonesia there was no film. There were friends. We are very proud because for all of your support, we can say that any genre has a chance to succeed in Indonesia, "he said. Joko Anwar, who was also previously successful with the Film Devils of Devils, hopes filmmakers in the country can continue to work to bring quality films with various genres." Hopefully in the future, more Indonesian films with themes, stories, a more diverse style. Amin ".Joko expressed his appreciation and thanks to the public and film lovers so that the PJT film was successful in the market. Did not rule out the possibility, the number of viewers will continue to grow because PJT Films are still playing in theaters. "You guys, love you !!! Thank you once again friends," he said. PTJ film, starring Indonesia's top film players. You name it, senior actress Christine Hakim. There is also the name Tara Basro whose career continues to climb, Ario Bayu, Marissa Anita and Asmara Abagail. This film takes a number of areas as shooting locations namely in Banyuwangi, Lumajang, and Mount Ijen. Joko Anwar is a director, screenwriter, and film producer who is cold-handed because his films are always successful in the market. For example, the film Pengabdi Setan, affirmed that it was the best-selling film in 2017 with 4.2 million viewers. Joko's other works are Film Gundala (2019), A copy of Mind (2015) which was successfully rewarded by the Citra Cup and a number of other awards both from within and outside the country. Then the film Pintu Terlarang (2009), Janji Joni (2005) and Anomaly Mode (2012). In the near future, another Joko film, Ratu Hitam Hitam will appear in cinemas throughout Indonesia. (SGD).
